jjk.title: Jujutsu Kaisen (Hindi Dubbed)
jjk.description: Yuji Itadori is a high-school student who unexpectedly becomes the host of a powerful curse named Ryomen Sukuna after swallowing one of his preserved fingers. To prevent Sukuna’s full resurrection and save humanity, Yuji joins a secret society of Jujutsu sorcerers who battle malevolent “curses” — supernatural entities born from negative human emotions — using cursed energy and special techniques. Thus begins his journey as a “curse to fight curses.”
jjk.tags: Dark Fantasy , Supernatural Action , Horror , Shonen

csm.title: Chainsaw Man (Hindi Dubbed)
csm.description: Denji, a broke teenager drowning in debt, works as a devil hunter with his chainsaw-dog Pochita. After a brutal betrayal, the two fuse, giving Denji the ability to turn his limbs into roaring chainsaws. Taken in by Public Safety, he begins hunting devils while navigating a dangerous world filled with eerie devils, manipulative humans, and his own wild dreams. Season 1 is a high-octane plunge into fear, desire, and power.
